results.content: Computers are useless. They can only give you answers.
results.author: Pablo Picasso

results.content: Adversity causes some men to break, others to break records.
results.author: William Ward

results.content: It has never been my object to record my dreams, just to realize them.
results.author: Man Ray

results.content: Almost everything comes from nothing.
results.author: Henri Amiel

results.content: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
results.author: Mohandas Gandhi

results.content: Knowledge rests not upon truth alone, but upon error also.
results.author: Carl Jung

results.content: It is fatal to enter any war without the will to win it.
results.author: General Douglas MacArthur

results.content: It is unwise to be too sure of one's own wisdom. It is healthy to be reminded that the strongest might weaken and the wisest might err.
results.author: Mahatma Gandhi

results.content: Knowledge comes, but wisdom lingers. It may not be difficult to store up in the mind a vast quantity of facts within a comparatively short time, but the ability to form judgments requires the severe discipline of hard work and the tempering heat of experience and maturity.
results.author: Calvin Coolidge

results.content: Ignorant men raise questions that wise men answered a thousand years ago.
results.author: Goethe

results.content: Strength to carry on despite the odds means you have faith in your own abilities and know how.
results.author: Byron Pulsifer

results.content: It is never too late. Even if you are going to die tomorrow, keep yourself straight and clear and be a happy human being today.
results.author: Lama Yeshe

results.content: You always succeed in producing a result.
results.author: Tony Robbins

results.content: Never make friends with people who are above or below you in status. Such friendships will never give you any happiness.
results.author: Chanakya

results.content: Love doesn't make the world go round, love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
results.author: Elizabeth Browning

results.content: Think how hard physics would be if particles could think.
results.author: Murray Gell-Mann

results.content: If a man does not make new acquaintances as he advances through life, he will soon find himself left alone. A man, sir, should keep his friendship in a constant repair.
results.author: Samuel Johnson

results.content: We know from science that nothing in the universe exists as an isolated or independent entity.
results.author: Margaret Wheatley

results.content: We shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do.
results.author: Mother Teresa

results.content: It is not so important to know everything as to appreciate what we learn.
results.author: Hannah More
